rows.label: tlk70000017_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear that one of you
invention-helpery types has
been granted the title of "knight"!

rows.label: tlk70000017_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Congratulations are in order!
Hip hip and all that!

rows.label: tlk70000017_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If one of you lot's been made a knight,
then I'll certainly be designated a
Iiran master inventor any day now.

rows.label: tlk70000017_03_msg0004
rows.name:
That's right. Aaany day
now... Gah hah hah!
